document_data.name: Sammaster's Lash
document_data.mainbody: '''''Sammaster's lash''''' was a [[spell]] that created a ribbon of force.
document_data.Effects: When cast, this spell created a ribbon of force. It was yellow-white in color and flew through the air. It was very thin. The caster controlled the ribbon using willpower. The ribbon was nearly invulnerable, only a ''[[dispel magic]]'' spell or a powerful magical barrier was able to stop it. When struck, a targeted creature became temporarily paralyzed.
document_data.Casting: In addition to [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components, the spell required a [[material component]], three hairs from a [[ghast]] braided together.
document_data.History: This spell was known to be used by wizards of the [[Cult of the Dragon]].
